sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_7b27bf69db09370019565d50cf961982
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.RemoveTheUser from The list look up in group table </api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>user addded in requested item based on group field in requested item . Finding the users that are removed from list collected from the from..
snd then delete the user from sys _user_grmember table </description><name>RemoveTheUser from The list look up in group table </name><script><![CDATA[var requestItem=new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
requestItem.get('1d9d7565dbc1370019565d50cf961978');
var group=requestItem.variables.goup;
var groupMember=requestItem.variables.group_member_list;
gs.info("group : "+group);
gs.info("group member : " + groupMember);
//var gp=JSON.stringify(groupMember);
//gs.info(gp);

var temp1=[];
temp1 = groupMember.toString().split(",");
gs.info("temp1 : " + temp1);

gs.info("type of group member : " + typeof groupMember);



var groupTableMember=[];
var groupTable=new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
groupTable.addQuery('group',group);
groupTable.query();
while (groupTable.next()){
groupTableMember.push(groupTable.user.sys_id.toString());
}

gs.info("group table member : "+ groupTableMember);
gs.info("type of group table member : "+ typeof groupTableMember);


var diff=[];
groupTableMember.forEach(makeCall);

function makeCall(ele){
if(temp1.indexOf(ele)==-1){
//gs.info(ele);
diff.push(ele);
}
}

gs.info(diff);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>RV</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-04-26 17:43:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>7b27bf69db09370019565d50cf961982</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>RemoveTheUser from The list look up in group table </sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7b27bf69db09370019565d50cf961982</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>RV</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-04-26 17:43:31</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
truefalseassignment_grouptruetrueGlideListsys_script_clientAG2019-04-25 18:15:11global/0193fe99db89f30019565d50cf9619511GlideListglobalglobalsys_script_client_0193fe99db89f30019565d50cf961951AG2019-04-25 18:57:16change_request

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_90298621db05370019565d50cf96198f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.ServiceCatalogWfScript</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>ServiceCatalogWfScript</name><script><![CDATA[var groupName = current.variables.var_group_name;
var groupMembers = current.variables.var_group_members;

//Set the new manager
if(current.variables.var_change_group_manager == "Yes") {
	var changeGroupManager = new GlideRecord("sys_user_group");
	changeGroupManager.addQuery("sys_id", groupName.toString());
	changeGroupManager.query();
	if (changeGroupManager.next()) {
		changeGroupManager.setValue("manager", current.variables.var_new_manager.toString());
		changeGroupManager.update();
	}
}
//Add new users to the group
var newMembers = groupMembers.toString().split(',').filter(isPresentInGroup);
newMembers.toString().split(",").forEach(function (userId) { 
	if (JSUtil.notNil(userId)) {
		var addGroupMembers = new GlideRecord("sys_user_grmember");
		addGroupMembers.initialize();
		addGroupMembers.setValue("group", groupName.toString());
		addGroupMembers.setValue("user", userId);
		addGroupMembers.insert();
	}
});
//Get the existing users from the group
function isPresentInGroup(userId){
	var gr=new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
	gr.addQuery('user', userId);
	gr.addQuery('group', groupName);
	gr.query();
	if(gr.next()){
		return false;
	}else{
		return true;
	}
}

var groupMembersArray = [];
groupMembersArray = groupMembers.toString().split(",");

var grMembers =[];
var grGroupMembers =new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
grGroupMembers.addQuery('group', groupName);
grGroupMembers.query();
while(grGroupMembers.next()){
	grMembers.push(grGroupMembers.getValue('user'));
}

//Get de-selected users from Glidelist
var removeMembers =[];
grMembers.forEach(function(item){
	if(groupMembersArray.indexOf(item)==-1){
		removeMembers.push(item);
	}
});
//Remove de-selected users from the group
removeMembers.forEach(function (userId) {
	if (JSUtil.notNil(userId)) {
		var removeGroupMembers = new GlideRecord("sys_user_grmember");
		removeGroupMembers.addQuery("group", groupName);
		removeGroupMembers.addQuery("user", userId);
		removeGroupMembers.query();
		if (removeGroupMembers.next() ) {
			removeGroupMembers.deleteRecord();
		}
	}
});
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>AG</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-04-26 09:40:38</sys_created_on><sys_id>90298621db05370019565d50cf96198f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ServiceCatalogWfScript</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_90298621db05370019565d50cf96198f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>AG</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-04-26 09:40:38</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_documentation_task_u_opened_at_en
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_documentation element="u_opened_at" label="Opened" language="en" table="task"><sys_documentation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><element>u_opened_at</element><help/><hint/><label>Opened</label><language>en</language><name>task</name><plural>Opened</plural><sys_class_name>sys_documentation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>AG</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-04-26 08:10:43</sys_created_on><sys_id>bea435eddb81370019565d50cf9619ff</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Opened</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_documentation_task_u_opened_at_en</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>AG</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-04-26 08:10:43</sys_updated_on><url/><url_target/></sys_documentation></sys_documentation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_89c7eedddb49f30019565d50cf96197b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.groupMember</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>groupMember</name><script><![CDATA[var groupMember = Class.create();
groupMember.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	getgroupMember:function() { 
		//var gp=' ';
		//gs.addInfoMessage('hi');
		var gap=[];
		var group=this.getParameter('sysparm_group');
		var grp=new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
		grp.addQuery('group',group);
		grp.query();
		try{
			while (grp.next()){ 
				gap.push(grp.user);
			}
		}
		catch (err){
			gs.getMessage(e);
		}
		//return 'sys_idIN' + gp;
		gs.addInfoMessage(gap);
		return 'sys_idIN' +gap.join();

	},

    type: 'groupMember'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>RV</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-04-25 17:21:52</sys_created_on><sys_id>89c7eedddb49f30019565d50cf96197b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>groupMember</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_89c7eedddb49f30019565d50cf96197b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>AG</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-04-25 18:04:34</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
